texto: includes changes in mission requirements, business opportunities, capabilities, performance improvement, or lack of existing systems, security and safety improvement, factors such as cost and effectiveness, regulation changes, user dissatisfaction, and PESTEL factors (Political, Economic, Social, Technological, Environmental, and Legal).
